Title: Aftermath
Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Tonya Kong (story editor), Sarah Streicher (staff writer)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Joanne Whalley
Plot: The press crucifies Daredevil after the attack on the Bulletin, and Agent Nadeem suspects the FBI paid too high a price for Fisk's cooperation.
